data: You're the new mechanic!{break}{mood:dislike}I mean, no, what was it?{break}{mood:laugh}ALCHEMIST. Alchemist.{break}{mood:happy}We haven't had one before, so I might forget the word again.{break}{mood:like}Nice to meet you!

So, um... I have a question.{break}{mood:laugh}I'm sorry if it's a stupid question!{break}What exactly.... IS an alchemist?{break}We never had one before. At least, not while I've been here.{break}And everyone seemed really excited when you got here, so I figure it's something good.{break}{mood:laugh}But I'd never even heard of alchemists before!
{mood:happy}I would love that!{break}I'll be ready at 20:00, okay?
{mood:sad}Sorry, I gotta do work that day.
Like a pharmacist. Or a chemist.
{mood:laugh}I've been spending too much time there lately.{break}{mood:like}How about some place new?

{mood:like}Oh, cool! Wowww. That's such a cool job.{break}{mood:happy}I never really have much need for potions 'cus I'm always super healthy, but it's still cool!{break}{mood:laugh}Sometimes I feel like my job is silly. It's just... painting.{break}{mood:default}People need doctors and stuff, not artists.{break}{mood:happy}But I make a good boyfriend. Just sayin'.{break}{mood:like}Can I walk you home? I just wanna make sure you get back okay.

Uhhh...{break}{mood:laugh}Yeah, I don't know what they do either!{break}{mood:like}Ah well, not important.{break}We've never really had a sort of... farmery doctor kind of person.{break}{mood:happy}I think it's nice to have you around.{break}{mood:like}Things on the island have been the same for ages, until you came along.{break}{mood:happy}So whatever you are, thank you!{break}{mood:like}Can I walk you home? I just wanna make sure you get back okay.
{mood:happy}A Fire Spirit egg? That's so thoughtful of you!{break}{mood:love}I hope this one hatches so I can have a pet of my own...

{mood:dislike}Hey, it takes a lot of bravery to admit to not knowing things.{break}Besides, we've never had an alchemist before.{break}You don't need to be mean about it.{break}{mood:sad}Sorry, I'm just... defensive about being made to feel stupid.{break}{mood:default}I think maybe we should end the date here.{break}I'll walk you home, though. It can be scary in the dark.
{mood:like}Oh wow, I like these! So warm.{break}{mood:happy}Thanks!

I can't believe you left home and came here just to help us.{break}{mood:like}You're really brave. I think that's so cool.{break}Did you have a lot of artists where you're from?{break}{mood:happy}On an island this small, we can only afford to have one.{break}I mostly don't mind, but I wish I had more art friends.{break}{mood:happy}But I guess artists aren't, like, the most important thing to have!
{mood:dislike}Ahhh this is so COLLLLDDDD!{break}{mood:awkward}Oh, no. I dropped it. Uh... oops.{break}Sorry! I just... I don't like cold things...
Art is one of the *most* important things!
{mood:dislike}You shouldn't give these to me!{break}They're useful! You need them!{break}Don't waste them on me!!
We had a few artists, but none like you.
Morning, sunshine! You look great today.
{mood:sad}I guess you were too busy for our date the other day.
Hi, babe! I feel like haven't seen you all day!

{mood:happy}Yeah, you're right!{break}{mood:default}I often feel like I should be more... helpful in some way, you know?{break}Like how Paolo makes furniture and Ofelia grows plants.{break}{mood:like}But art is good. Art helps.{break}My mentor once told me that art is important for society just like doctors are.{break}She said it was a way of looking inside ourselves. And that's just as important as looking outside.{break}Well, I hope that's true.{break}{mood:happy}And I hope some day I get to meet the artists from your home town!{break}{mood:like}Hey, on the walk home, can you tell me about some of them...?
See you later, honeybunch!{random}Bye, gorgeous.{random}I love you!!!

{mood:happy}Wow, that's really nice of you. Thank you.{break}{mood:laugh}I don't think I've ever had someone from out of town compliment my work!{break}You better not be saying that just to get a free painting!{break}{mood:default}But yeah... It's a bit lonely sometimes, being the only artist here.{break}{mood:like}Maybe I can show you more of my work some time.{break}{mood:happy}But for now, I gotta go to bed. I'm so sleepy!
I was stuck on another island.
Another perfect day with the love of my life!

{mood:dislike}Hey, that's not nice.{break}I know I'm not in museums or anything, but I'm still a real artist.{break}{mood:default}Look, I'm sorry if you felt like you had no choice to move here.{break}I bet it was really hard and lonely.{break}But I hope you learn to love it on Moonstone Island, too.{break}Just don't take it out on us, okay?{break}Come on, I'll walk you home.
{mood:sad}Yeah, it's okay...{break}I just spent the evening waiting, that's all.

{mood:laugh}...I mean, can you imagine me as a doctor?{break}{mood:happy}I'm way too forgetful. I'd leave scalpels inside people.{break}{mood:like}Nah, I'm happy as an artist. I'm good at it, and I like feeling good at things.{break}School was all about being good at exams and essays. That's just not me!{break}{mood:laugh}Maybe I'm too stupid to do anything except painting, haha!
{mood:like}Ossono made me a birthday card, look!{break}{mood:happy}Isn't that nice?{break}{mood:like}And Ofelia made me these socks, look!{break}My friends are the best.
Not being good at essays doesn't mean you're stupid.
{mood:like}Whooooa, you got me a present, too?{break}{mood:happy}Man, how lucky am I! Thank you!
The world needs more art, less essays!
{mood:like}Oh, I like what you've done with your hair today.
Are you still going on about this?
{mood:like}Let me know if you need any help with anything!

Oh, I know.{break}But I did spend, like... 16 years thinking I was bad at everything.{break}{mood:laugh}Turns out I'm just bad at SCHOOL.{break}And school doesn't really tell you that there are other things to be good at, you know?{break}Especially when you're surrounded by kids who seem to get things that you don't.{break}{mood:like}But it's cool! I'm good at a lot of other things.{break}{mood:happy}Art, cooking, making friends, kissing...{break}{mood:laugh}I'm bad at flirting, though!{break}{mood:like}Come on, I'll walk you home.
// Confirmation dialogue when you give an NPC a moonstone baracelet
You look like you need a drink.

Actually, it's "fewer". Fewer essays.{break}{mood:laugh}Sorry, that's literally the only grammar rule I remember.{break}{mood:like}I do wish that school taught you to be good at other stuff more.{break}It's hard to be surrounded by kids who get rewarded for good spelling and test results.{break}School woulda been easier if there was other ways of doing well.{break}{mood:happy}Maybe you're right and we do need more art.{break}{mood:laugh}As long as we still have scientists and doctors!{break}{mood:love}But if I ever have a kid... I'll let them be whatever they want.{break}{mood:like}It's getting cold, wanna head home?
Are you asking me to be your boyfriend?
{mood:sad}Aw, no need to be mean.{break}{mood:default}I guess it's just been on my mind lately.{break}{mood:sad}Ah, forget it. I've made myself look like an idiot.{break}I'm gonna head home.
I might go to Zed's place later.{break}He's always got the coolest stuff.
So, like... does your cape help you fly?

Ossono's been teaching me a bit about foraging.{break}{mood:happy}It's really cool. You get free food from nature!{break}{npc:down}{mood:like}Like... see this here?{break}{mood:laugh}That's a, um, coconut jellyfish. I think.{break}{mood:happy}I'm pretty sure it's edible. Like, 85% sure.
{mood:happy}No way, I would love that!{break}Man, how lucky am I to be dating someone as cool and smart as you?
Do you need any help with farming or digging?{break}{mood:happy}I love digging holes.
I think we should find something you're 100% sure about.
It gets so warm here in summer.{break}{mood:awkward}Is it because we're closer to the sun?
// If heart level is too low, NPC will decline the bracelet
I don't know what your life was like before you came here...{break}{mood:like}But we all really like having you around.

{mood:laugh}Oh, yeah, I agree!{break}I wasn't going to eat it!{break}{mood:happy}I'm not that adventurous, to be honest.{break}{mood:like}I like the simple things, you know?{break}{mood:love}Freshly-baked bread, the smell of a new can of paint...{break}{mood:happy}...And you, I guess!{break}{mood:awkward}I mean, not that I'm saying you're simple. I mean, like, you're easy to hang out with.{break}{mood:happy}So, if you want... we should do this again.{break}{mood:laugh}But let's go somewhere where we're 200% sure about the food next time!
{mood:awkward}I, uh, I don't think I'm ready for that yet!{break}{mood:sad}Sorry...
How are your crops doing?{break}{mood:like}Make sure to keep them watered in this weather!

{mood:awkward}Hey, wait, no!{break}Don't just eat stuff because I said it was PROBABLY not poison!{break}{mood:laugh}You're gonna give me a heart attack.{break}{mood:like}I appreciate your trust in me, but you gotta be careful.{break}There's actual poisonous stuff around here!{break}{mood:sad}I'd be really sad if you got hurt, okay?{break}{mood:happy}Come on, let's get you home before you eat a handful of sand.{break}{mood:laugh}I'M KIDDING. Mostly.
{mood:sad}I had chocolate in my pocket, but it melted.

{mood:awkward}Uh, well, with a 25% chance that I'm wrong...{break}{mood:laugh}I think I'll pass, thanks.{break}{mood:dislike}Wait, not 25%. It's 15%. Numbers aren't my strong point.{break}{mood:default}Anyway, I hope you're not trying to kill me!{break}I should probably ask Ossono for more lessons...{break}{mood:laugh}And maybe next date let's go somewhere with DEFINITELY edible food.
// Confirmation dialogue when you give an NPC a grass baracelet
I know I look tough, but I'm actually a total softie.
{mood:happy}Hang in there! I believe in you!
I don't mind helping people.{break}{mood:like}Actually, I love helping out.

I love birthdays. Mine and everyone else's, too!{break}It's a day that's all about that one person. Just one day where they get to feel special.{break}{mood:like}My absolute FAVOURITE thing to do with people I like is to swap homemade gifts.{break}{mood:default}But not a lot of people here are crafty types, you know?{break}{mood:laugh}I guess I could swap for, like... a fish and a pint.{break}{mood:happy}What would your homemade thing be?

{mood:sad}Oh.{break}...{break}Was it something I said? Or didn't say?{break}I'm sorry. I tried really hard.{break}...{break}{mood:default}Hey... For what it's worth, I had a lot of fun.{break}So, thank you for that.{break}{mood:sad}Now, I, um... I need to go get rid of a painting.
I like to stand on the bridge when I need to think.{break}{mood:happy}I have some of my best thoughts on the bridge.

{mood:happy}Cool. Cool. Wow, my heart just stopped, I think.{break}{mood:like}Yeah, I guess you don't know the customs around here.{break}Grass bracelets are, like, "I don't like you any more and we should break up".{break}{mood:sad}Honestly, I think it's kinda cold... and you know I don't like cold things.
{mood:like}I'm just so glad to have friends here.

{mood:love}Oh, that would be SO cool.{break}{mood:laugh}As long as it's not a poison!{break}{mood:happy}We should totally do a swap some time!{break}{mood:like}What kind of potions do you make?{break}{mood:happy}No, wait, don't tell me! Let it be a surprise.{break}{mood:like}And I'd be honoured to have my art in your home.{break}Speaking of home... I need to get back.{break}{mood:happy}Early start tomorrow!
{mood:laugh}Hey, remember when I thought you were a mechanic?{break}{mood:happy}That was fun.

{mood:like}Oh yeah! I forgot you did farming too.{break}Yeah, that would be cool!{break}We do have a lot of fresh veg here in town, though.{break}We get pretty regular deliveries. And Ofelia and Gaiana grow stuff, too.{break}{mood:happy}I'm sure yours tastes extra good, though!{break}{mood:like}And I love having loads of vegetables. I mush them up into protein smoothies.{break}Oh, it's getting late.{break}I need to head home... want to walk with me for a bit?
{mood:happy}I'm really glad our alchemist turned out to be you.
Oh, sorry.{break}I shouldn't have assumed.{break}{mood:laugh}I didn't mean to force my art on you!{break}{mood:default}Should we... get the bill?

{mood:love}I love fireworks. So big and sparkly.{break}{mood:laugh}The loud noises scare me a bit, but it's worth it!{break}{mood:like}Maybe one day I'll figure out how to paint fireworks. I might need to buy glitter...{break}{mood:happy}Would you like to hang out and watch them together?
{break}{mood:laugh}Guess who fell out of bed last night! Again!

...and lately, well... I don't know.{break}It feels a bit like Ossono is making fun of me.{break}She's always pulling pranks on me that make me feel a bit...{break}{mood:sad}...stupid.{break}...I don't think she's trying to be mean, but... it make me feel bad sometimes.{break}{mood:default}What should I do?
A real friend doesn't take advantage of you like that.
{mood:happy}Sweet!{break}{mood:laugh}Alright, get ready... If I get scared, I might need to hold your hand!
Ossono asked me to lift her up earlier.{break}{mood:laugh}She's way lighter than she looks. It was like lifting a baby!
Tell her you don't like it. She'll understand.
{mood:sad}I miss my little sister like crazy today.{break}She loves winter...
You have to stop being so gullible.
I hope I can be a dad some day.{break}{mood:like}I think I'd be good at it.

{mood:sad}...you think she's not my friend?{break}I don't know. I guess...{break}Maybe I should just talk this over with her.{break}{npc:up}...{break}{npc:down}{mood:default}I think I need to go and think about this... alone.{break}{mood:sad}I'm sorry.
// When the player gives a spirit to an NPC (the matchmaker quest)
Have you got any spare sweater plants?

{mood:sad}But... I'd rather be the butt of jokes than not have her as a friend.{break}I'm worried that she won't like it if I stand up for myself.{break}But... maybe you're right.{break}{npc:down}I think I need to be alone for a bit. Sorry.

{mood:love}This is... for me?{break}{mood:happy}Hello little Sheemp! You're so warm!{break}{mood:like}I'm going to take such good care of you, buddy.{break}{mood:happy}Thank you so much!!{break}{mood:like}Don't tell Ossono, but I'll totally give you a free beer on Fridays as a thank you.{break}{mood:happy}She won't even notice, it's always busy on a Friday!
Snow looks so soft, but it isn't.

{mood:dislike}I can't help it. I've tried.{break}{mood:sad}But I don't want to lose her as a friend.{break}I want to trust her. But she's making it hard...{break}I think I should go and talk to her. I'll see you later.

{mood:happy}Wowwww so cool! Look at this guy!{break}{mood:default}He's super warm... but not very soft...{break}{mood:sad}I was really hoping for a soft Spirit to hug... I'm sorry, Spirit. And Alchemist.
Today's a good day to go to the hot spring.
Where does all the green go when it's winter?{break}{mood:sad}I miss leaves.

{mood:like}So, I wanted to say thank you.{break}I talked to Ossono. I said she was making me feel stupid.{break}She said she didn't mean it.{break}She was kinda busy so we didn't really get to talk about it, but that's okay.{break}{mood:laugh}Anyway, I mean, it's my fault for being so gullible, right?
{mood:like}Oh, I asked for this?{break}{mood:laugh}I totally forgot, sorry! Thank you, though!{break}{mood:happy}Here, you can have my tips for the day as a thank you!
No. You deserve better than that.
That doesn't sound like an apology...

Happy spring!{break}{mood:laugh}I used to think it was called "spring" because it was the opposite of "fall".{break}{mood:like}Like, spring forward, fall back.{break}{mood:awkward}Wait, why IS it called spring?
Yeah, her pranks were really obvious!
{mood:happy}It's my birthday tomorrow!!!{break}{mood:like}I love birthdays. Especially mine.

I do?{break}...{break}{mood:dislike}Yeah. Yeah! I do!{break}You're right. I wouldn't let one of MY friends get kicked around like this!{break}{mood:default}If I get the chance to talk to her again today, I'm gonna tell her how I feel.{break}{mood:default}Ossono can be really nice, but she's really smart, and I think she uses that to feel superior.{break}{mood:sad}I know it's probably because people made her feel bad in the past too.{break}{npc:up}{mood:default}Oh, there she is... You think I should go talk to her now?{break}{mood:like}Okay! Wish me luck!
// Confirmation dialogue when you propose to marry
{mood:happy}It's my birthday tomorrow!!!{break}I hope I get to see you.

{mood:awkward}Wait, you think I should still be upset with her?{break}{mood:default}But... she's my friend. She's not trying to hurt me.{break}So I should tell her... that she should treat her friends better?{break}...Well, I can try.{break}{mood:sad}The thing is... I know Ossono is only being like that because she's been hurt in the past, too.{break}{mood:dislike}Not that that makes it okay to treat people badly!{break}{mood:sad}I just want to be understanding.{break}{npc:up}{mood:default}Oh, there she is now...{break}You think I should talk to her now? Okay!{break}{mood:like}I'll see you later. Wish me luck!
{mood:happy}WHAAAAAAAAAT! You want to marry me? Really? Really really???
Ossono said I should try using "striped paint".{break}{mood:awkward}But I can't find it anywhere...
Yeah, I guess they were...{break}...{break}{mood:sad}Maybe I really am stupid.{break}I think I'm going to head back now. I'm... tired.
I don't know if I already told you, but I'm an artist.{break}{mood:laugh}I feel like everyone else here runs a shop! Not me though.
You know, people say I'm a great listener.{break}{mood:like}If you ever wanna talk, I can listen.{break}{mood:happy}I also give good hugs, apparently!

Me and Ossono talked it out properly, by the way.{break}{mood:like}It was so scary! But it went well. She apologised properly and we hugged it out.{break}{mood:sad}I guess I was scared that I would ruin the friendship. And that would ruin *everything*.{break}{mood:default}But... I'm glad I stood up for myself.{break}It could have ended badly, and that's why I was scared to say something.{break}But... Ossono's a good person. I had to trust that she would understand.{break}{mood:love}Still, I don't think I would have done it if you hadn't made me see my own worth.{break}Thank you.
{mood:happy}Uh, YEAH, obviously! 100%! No, 110%!{break}{mood:laugh}A BILLION percent yes!!!{break}{mood:happy}I'm gonna be the BEST husband EVER.
{mood:awkward}Did you see that weird light in the distance last night?{break}{mood:laugh}I spent so long staring at it that it burned into my eyes!
I love how kind you are.
{mood:sad}Oh, right. Yeah. Accidentally proposing... Happens all the time.
Moonstones are so beautiful.{break}{mood:like}If you find one, treasure it!
Friends who make you feel worthless aren't your friends.

I don't usually drink much, but Ossono's letting me celebrate with a couple of drinks while I work.{break}{mood:like}Why am I celebrating?{break}{mood:happy}I sold a really expensive piece of art for more than I was expecting!{break}Cheers!
Are all our dates going to be about Ossono?
// If too early to marry, NPC will decline the bracelet
I heard there's a spring flower that's made of fire.{break}{mood:happy}I think that sounds awesome.{break}{mood:like}Have you found any? I'd like to see one...

{mood:happy}Thank you! That means a lot to me.{break}{mood:like}I mean, I'm nothing special, I just want to treat people nicely.{break}{mood:love}But... you make me feel like I'm special.{break}I think you're pretty special, too.{break}{mood:like}Oh, and that whole Ossono thing...{break}{mood:laugh}It turns out she has, like, 50 brothers or something.{break}Apparently teasing is how they show affection.{break}{mood:default}And honestly, I don't really mind it now that I know it's how she tells me she cares about me.{break}{mood:happy}It's getting dark, though! We should get to bed. Race you!
{mood:awkward}Uhhhhhh, I don't... think... that's a good idea.{break}{mood:like}Maybe once we, like, know more about each other? Who knows?

Hey, have you checked those glowing patches of grass at night?{break}{mood:happy}You totally should.{break}One time I looked in those grass patches and found a Moonstone!!{break}{mood:like}I was gonna turn it into paint but Zed said I should put it back.

Yeah, you're right.{break}{mood:like}But I promise Ossono and I have worked it out. Properly.{break}{mood:default}I think she didn't realise how mean she was being, and how it hurt.{break}{mood:awkward}It turns out she has LOADS of brothers, and that's how they showed affection.{break}{mood:laugh}Don't worry! I didn't let her off the hook.{break}{mood:happy}I said she was allowed to prank me, but she had to give me her tips for the day in return.{break}{mood:like}And she said she'd make it up to me, too.{break}{mood:happy}...She's going to clean my brushes for a month! And all my tavern drinks are free!{break}{mood:happy}Oh, it's getting late. Let me walk you home as a thank you for your advice!

{mood:awkward}Oh... I'm sorry!{break}I didn't mean to... I...{break}{mood:sad}I've been a terrible date, haven't I?{break}I've been talking about how Ossono didn't realise how I felt and I was doing the same to you.{break}I'm sorry.{break}{npc:right}I'm just gonna... go. Sorry.
{mood:happy}I totally called it. I knew you'd end up together. Congrats!{break}{mood:like}Oh, yeah, by the way... Did y'all get a cake? And can I take some home?
Happy summer!{break}{mood:like}Hey, maybe we can go swimming some time!
Let me know if you grow any Flameroots or Hot Air Fruits.{break}{mood:happy}I love them, they're so cool!{break}{mood:laugh}I mean... they're so WARM!
{mood:love}I wish I had a puppy. A lil fluffy guy to take care of.{break}{mood:like}I think I'd be a really good dog dad.

{mood:like}I loveeeee being in the heat like this.{break}If I could, I'd be slightly too warm all the time. I take hot showers every day!{break}{mood:laugh}I can't stand things that are cold! Snow, ice, fish... no thanks.{break}{mood:like}Are you a hot or a cold kinda person?
{mood:like}Can you believe that we get to live here?{break}It's so pretty.
If my skin isn't melting, it's not hot enough.
Let's stay a bit longer, ok?
Sorry my place is messy.{break}{mood:happy}I never have the time to tidy.
I like both! Hot summers, cold winters.
I don't know why it gets so cold at night even in summer.{break}{mood:like}Maybe it's because the moon is like the sun, but cold.
I can't stand the heat. I don't even know why I asked you here.
{mood:laugh}You know, I didn't even know we HAD a rift.{break}{mood:like}Still, I'm really glad you closed it.{break}{mood:happy}And that we get a party to celebrate it. So, thanks!
I saw those lights in the sky again.{break}You should go find out what they are!{break}{mood:laugh}I'm way too chicken.

{mood:happy}Yes!!! You get it!{break}{mood:like}It's like... if the water's super hot, my brain can only think about that, and not work or sad stuff.{break}{mood:happy}Well, that and... you.{break}{mood:laugh}Haha, sorry. That was so cheesy.{break}{mood:happy}I just mean, like... it's nice to have my brain feel empty for a bit.{break}I find it kinda hard to relax a lot of the time!{break}{mood:like}But spending time with you helps, too. You're like... a hot spring for my heart.{break}{mood:laugh}Haha, shut up, Quill. Time to get out!
Zed told me that hot springs are good for hot weather.{break}Does that mean cold water is good for cold weather?

My family is like that. They love the cold.{break}Me, I find it a bit boring. I prefer plants to snow.{break}{mood:laugh}I guess I should learn to love the winter, since it's gonna keep happening!{break}{mood:like}Luckily for me, I look reaaaally good in sweaters. And mittens.{break}{mood:happy}Maybe I can show you some time.{break}Wanna walk home together?
{mood:happy}No way, you made a spicy pasta for me?{break}You're the bestest best. I can't get enough of those hot peppers.
{mood:happy}Ossono made a batch of root beer just for me!
{mood:laugh}Wait, really?{break}{mood:default}That's a shame.{break}Okay, next time we'll go somewhere cooler.{break}{mood:sad}Better get out then, I guess...

Can I ask you something that might sound a bit stupid?{break}...{break}{mood:awkward}Where does all the water on the island come from???{break}And, like... where does it go?{break}...{break}{mood:sad}Oh, that's okay. No one seems to have the answer...

So, has this Great Spirit been inside this hot spring the whole time?{break}{mood:awkward}I've skinny dipped in here so many times! Oh no!!!{break}{mood:laugh}Anyway, do you wanna hang out with me while the festival stuff happens?

I used to be so scrawny as a kid.{break}Other kids would pick on me. I didn't mind, really.{break}If they're mean to me, I can take it. It's okay.{break}{mood:dislike}But then they started picking on my sister. And that's NOT okay.{break}{mood:laugh}So, I started swimming. And lifting weights. And I got BUFF.{break}{mood:happy}They didn't pick on her after that... or me, either.{break}They left both of us alone.
Happy fall!{break}My sister used to say, "happy fall, have a nice trip", but then she would trip me over.{break}{mood:laugh}OHHHHH, I GET IT. Right. Fall.
You were okay with getting bullied?
